original_title: Exitus Interruptus - Der Tod ist erst der Anfang
overview: Manuela was kidnapped.  Ever since she has been tormented by the experience, seeking the help of a psychiatrist.  Five years after her first ordeal she finds herself being kidnapped by another madman and is taken to an isolated mansion. This time her abductor isn't interested in raping and killing her. His sinister games run much deeper, and threaten to break both the mind and spirit of poor Manuela.
title: Exitus Interruptus
